concept.title: Wildcards for Arrays and Maps
concept.shortdesc: You can use wildcards to represent sections of a map field path.

draft-comment.author: Loretta
draft-comment.p: ** array index or map key ** Team [*]/Employee[*]/* (for all info about all employees on all teams

conbody.p: Use a wildcard to reference field or multiple fields in a map or array where you don't want to explicitly define the field path.
Use wildcards to represent sections of field paths that are not known during development or that apply to multiple fields to be processed
